resources.string: Your score indicates that you are feeling many symptoms of anxiety.

Any changes in income, employment, life events such as the death of a loved one or a relationship break-up, physical illness and problems caused by alcohol and drug use can trigger anxiety or depressive disorders; making it difficult to focus or be productive at day to day tasks.
Bemo is way of receiving guided emotional support to understand what affects you and start feeling relief with our therapy care plans.
Connect with a therapist for free and recieve weekly care plans. See if bemo is for you!
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?

Hi, I’m excited to partner with you on your emotional support journey. For the past 7 years as a clinical psychologist, I’ve been privileged to facilitate the growth of many clients’ psychosocial well-being via CBT and Motivational Interviewing frameworks: approaches that have been studied and shown to be effective to enacting positive, lasting change. As well, I’m looking forward to getting to know you and what you’re hoping to accomplish. I’ll be here to provide personalized accountability, feedback, and motivation to help you achieve those personal milestones. As well, if you ever have any questions about the program, don’t hesitate to ask! Looking forward to working with you :)
Worrying makes it difficult to focus or be productive at your day to day tasks. Anxiety and depressive disorders are triggered by various contributor factors.

Life events such as any changes in income, employment,death of a loved one or a relationship break-up can cause your anxiety to trigger. Physical illness and alcohol and drugs use can also be contributing factors that trigger your anxiety.
Connect with a therapist who understands how you live your day to day life and get access to unlimited messaging therapy and our researched therapy techniques for you.
We take your privacy seriously and everything you share with Bemo is confidential. We’re excited for you to meet your coach and try intelligent techniques that work for you.
Now, you may be thinking is this free or paid? What do i get?
